contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 28, 1907 D Crystal Palace (Consolation Cup)
Crystal Palace (Consolation Cup) 152 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) crystal-palace-consolation-cup
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Crystal Palace (Swing Grounds), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK 1st prize £5 and cup. 2nd prize £3. 3rd prize £2. 4th prize £1. Choice of Old Memories or Mikado Selection No 2. Caerphilly were originally placed first, but later disqualified (BB 16/11/1907). Hitchin Town and Jump Subscription were also both listed in the 1908 BB Annual, but not in the original programme. Their inclusion seems probably erroneous; please contact us if you have further information.
April 7, 2012, 4:10 p.m. July 6, 2015, 4:45 p.m.
1 Cottingham Band W. Brocklesby Old Memories
2 St. Pancras Fred Dimmock Mikado Selection No 2
3 Cudworth T. Garbutt Old Memories
4 Sutton in Ashfield J. T. White Old Memories
5 Bargoed Mr Turner Old Memories
6 Nottingham Railway City R. Mills Old Memories
7 Northfield Institute H. Price Old Memories
8 1st Gloucester Engineers F. Plucknett Old Memories
9 The Egham Band H. Sutcliffe Old Memories
10 Willesden E. Brophy Old Memories
Disqualified Caerphilly David Stephens Mikado Selection No 2
